summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Railroad Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from University Street to a point One Hundred Twenty (120) feet south of King Street, by planking the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 579 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
